title: My club not showing up
body:
I created a club called 'Delay Nooo More' (Tag: D97N) quite a long time now. After the clubs went down a month ago I never got added back to my club. Although for my friends, it says I'm still in the club but the tag, club chat and club tab are not showing up on my list at all.

Could I get put back in my club?

replies.body: I am having the same issue? My club does not show up to me but to my friends it says I am still in it.
I looked into this for you and everything looks okay!  Let me know if this is still an issue.
I have submitted a ticket few days ago and got my account restored, so everything looks good now! Thanks.

Hello! :( You got time to help me out? I just got kicked out of my OWN club that I created, I'm very sad and Riot Support is lying to me :c I explained it in another topic but could post it here again if you'd like! or should I make my own thread? >_<<<<<<<  {{item:3070}}
